name: Fish-Y Recolored!
description:
As I found out about Flash support ending in 2021, I got a little sad for all the great Flash games that are in potential danger. This is a tribute to one of the first games I played on the internet.

There are some popular preservation projects such as Ruffle and Flashpoint, if you want to play those old Flash games as originally intended. (You can also support them)

I took another route, by recreating the game in a recent engine. That way the main concept and idea is preserved, while also updating the graphics and adding some gameplay mechanics of my own :) (think of a fan remake)

Hope you enjoy it!

Instructions:

Arrows to move.

Eat small fish to grow bigger, and don't get eaten by bigger fish.

The bigger the fish you eat, the bigger the score you get.
